verses.verse: And Jehovah <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> and to Aaron <WH175>, saying unto them <WH559>,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, These <WH2063> are the living things <WH2416> which ye may eat <WH398> among all the beasts <WH929> that are on the earth <WH776>.
Whatsoever parteth <WH6536> the hoof <WH6541>, and is clovenfooted <WH8156>, and cheweth <WH5927> the cud <WH1625>, among the beasts <WH929>, that may ye eat <WH398>.

Nevertheless <WH389> these shall ye not eat <WH398> of them that chew <WH5927> the cud <WH1625>, or of them that part <WH6536> the hoof <WH6541>: the camel <WH1581>, because he cheweth <WH5927> the cud <WH1625> but parteth <WH6536> not the hoof <WH6541>, he is unclean unto you <WH2931>.
And the coney <WH8227>, because he cheweth <WH5927> the cud <WH1625> but parteth <WH6536> not the hoof <WH6541>, he is unclean unto you <WH2931>.
And the hare <WH768>, because she cheweth <WH5927> the cud <WH1625> but parteth <WH6536> not the hoof <WH6541>, she is unclean unto you <WH2931>.
And the swine <WH2386>, because he parteth <WH6536> the hoof <WH6541>, and is clovenfooted <WH8156>, but cheweth <WH1641> not the cud <WH1625>, he is unclean unto you <WH2931>.
Of their flesh <WH1320> ye shall not eat <WH398>, and their carcasses <WH5038> ye shall not touch <WH5060>; they are unclean unto you <WH2931>.

These may ye eat <WH398> of all that are in the waters <WH4325>: whatsoever hath fins <WH5579> and scales <WH7193> in the waters <WH4325>, in the seas <WH3220>, and in the rivers <WH5158>, that may ye eat <WH398>.

And all that have not fins <WH5579> and scales <WH7193> in the seas <WH3220>, and in the rivers <WH5158>, of all that move <WH8318> in the waters <WH4325>, and of all the living <WH2416> creatures <WH5315> that are in the waters <WH4325>, they are an abomination unto you <WH8263>,
and they shall be an abomination <WH8263> unto you <WH398>; ye shall not eat of their flesh <WH1320>, and their carcasses <WH5038> ye shall have in abomination <WH8262>.
Whatsoever hath no fins <WH5579> nor scales <WH7193> in the waters <WH4325>, that is an abomination unto you <WH8263>.

And these ye shall have in abomination <WH8262> among <WH4480> the birds <WH5775>; they shall not be eaten <WH398>, they are an abomination <WH8263>: the eagle <WH5404>, and the gier-eagle <WH6538>, and the ospray <WH5822>,
and the kite <WH344>, and the falcon <WH344> after its kind <WH4327>,
every raven <WH6158> after its kind <WH4327>,
and the ostrich <WH1323>, and the night-hawk <WH8464>, and the sea-mew <WH7828>, and the hawk <WH8464> after its kind <WH4327>,
and the little owl <WH3563>, and the cormorant <WH7994>, and the great owl <WH3244>,
and the horned owl <WH8580>, and the pelican <WH6893>, and the vulture <WH7360>,
and the stork <WH2624>, the heron <WH601> after its kind <WH4327>, and the hoopoe <WH1744>, and the bat <WH5847>.
All winged <WH5775> creeping <WH8318> things that go <WH1980> upon all fours <WH702> are an abomination unto you <WH8263>.

Yet these may ye eat <WH398> of all winged <WH5775> creeping <WH8318> things that go <WH1980> upon all fours <WH702>, which have legs <WH3767> above <WH4605> their feet <WH7272>, wherewith <WH2004> to leap <WH5425> upon the earth <WH776>.

Even these of them ye may eat <WH398>: the locust <WH697> after its kind <WH4327>, and the bald locust <WH5556> after its kind <WH4327>, and the cricket <WH2728> after its kind <WH4327>, and the grasshopper <WH2284> after its kind <WH4327>.
But all winged <WH5775> creeping things <WH8318>, which have four <WH702> feet <WH7272>, are an abomination unto you <WH8263>.
And by these ye shall become unclean <WH2930>: whosoever toucheth <WH5060> the carcass <WH5038> of them shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>;
And whosoever beareth <WH5375> aught of the carcass <WH5038> of them shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899>, and be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.

Every beast <WH929> which parteth <WH6536> the hoof <WH6541>, and is not clovenfooted <WH8157>, nor cheweth <WH5927> the cud <WH1625>, is unclean <WH2931> unto you <WH5060>: every one that toucheth them shall be unclean <WH2930>.

And whatsoever <WH3605> goeth <WH1980> upon its paws <WH3709>, among all beasts <WH2416> that go <WH1980> on all fours <WH702>, they are unclean <WH2931> unto you <WH5060>: whoso toucheth their carcass <WH5038> shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.
And he that beareth <WH5375> the carcass <WH5038> of them shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899>, and be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>: they are unclean unto you <WH2931>.

And these are they which are unclean <WH2931> unto you among the creeping things <WH8318> that creep <WH8317> upon the earth <WH776>: the weasel <WH2467>, and the mouse <WH5909>, and the great lizard <WH6632> after its kind <WH4327>,
and the gecko <WH604>, and the land-crocodile <WH3581>, and the lizard <WH3911>, and the sand-lizard <WH2546>, and the chameleon <WH8580>.
These are they which are unclean <WH2931> to you among all that creep <WH8318>: whosoever doth touch <WH5060> them <WH4194>, when they are dead, shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.

And upon whatsoever any of them <WH4194>, when they are dead, doth fall <WH5307>, it shall be unclean <WH2930>; whether it be any vessel <WH3627> of wood <WH6086>, or raiment <WH899>, or skin <WH5785>, or sack <WH8242>, whatsoever vessel <WH3627> it be <WH4399>, wherewith any work is done <WH6213>, it must be put <WH935> into water <WH4325>, and it shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>; then shall it be clean.
And every earthen <WH2789> vessel <WH3627>, whereinto any of them falleth <WH5307>, whatsoever is in it shall be unclean <WH2930>, and it ye shall break <WH7665>.

All food <WH400> therein which may be eaten <WH398>, that on which water <WH4325> cometh <WH935>, shall be unclean <WH2930>; and all drink <WH4945> that may be drunk <WH8354> in every such vessel <WH3627> shall be unclean <WH2930>.

And every thing whereupon any part of their carcass <WH5038> falleth <WH5307> shall be unclean <WH2930>; whether oven <WH8574>, or range for pots <WH2931>, it shall be broken in pieces: they are unclean, and shall be unclean unto you <WH2931>.
Nevertheless a fountain <WH4599> or a pit <WH953> wherein is a gathering of water <WH4325> shall be clean <WH2889>: but that which toucheth <WH5060> their carcass <WH5038> shall be unclean <WH2930>.
And if aught of their carcass <WH5038> fall <WH5307> upon any sowing <WH2221> seed <WH2233> which is to be sown <WH2232>, it is clean <WH2889>.
But if water <WH4325> be put <WH5414> upon the seed <WH2233>, and aught of their carcass <WH5038> fall <WH5307> thereon <WH2931>, it is unclean unto you.
And if any beast <WH929>, of which ye may eat <WH402>, die <WH4191>; he that toucheth <WH5060> the carcass <WH5038> thereof shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.

And he that eateth <WH398> of the carcass <WH5038> of it shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899>, and be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>: he also that beareth <WH5375> the carcass <WH5038> of it shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899>, and be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.
And every creeping thing <WH8318> that creepeth <WH8317> upon the earth <WH776> is an abomination <WH8263>; it shall not be eaten <WH398>.

Whatsoever goeth <WH1980> upon the belly <WH1512>, and whatsoever goeth <WH1980> upon all fours <WH702>, or whatsoever hath many feet <WH7272>, even all creeping things <WH8318> that creep <WH8317> upon the earth <WH776>, them ye shall not eat <WH398>; for they are an abomination <WH8263>.

Ye shall not make <WH8262> yourselves <WH5315> abominable <WH8262> with any creeping thing <WH8318> that creepeth <WH8317>, neither shall ye make yourselves unclean <WH2933> with them <WH2930>, that ye should be defiled thereby.

For I am Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>: sanctify yourselves <WH6942> therefore <WH6918>, and be ye holy; for I am holy: neither shall ye defile <WH2930> yourselves <WH5315> with any manner of creeping thing <WH8318> that moveth upon the earth <WH776>.
For I am Jehovah <WH3068> that brought <WH5927> you up out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, to be your God <WH430>: ye shall therefore be holy <WH6918>, for I am holy <WH6918>.

This is the law <WH8451> of the beast <WH929>, and of the bird <WH5775>, and of every living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> that moveth <WH7430> in the waters <WH4325>, and of every creature <WH5315> that creepeth <WH8317> upon the earth <WH776>;

to make a distinction <WH914> between the unclean <WH2931> and the clean <WH2889>, and between the living thing <WH2416> that may be eaten <WH398> and the living thing <WH2416> that may not be eaten <WH398>.
